blogs.title: My motivation site
blogs.body: To dare is to lose your footing momentarily, not to dare is to lose oneself
blogs.author: Robert Greeene

blogs.title: Continued motivation
blogs.body: Mistakes made through audacity can be corrected with even more audacity
blogs.author: Robert Greeene

blogs.title: Motivation requiem
blogs.body: Resist Demoralization always, even when the odds are not in your favor, This is the one time logic is your enemy, and faith is your friend
blogs.author: IM

blogs.title: Source of truth
blogs.body: The path to enlightenment is seldom trod upon, because if it were all a matter of following your own bliss, and doing what made you happy, then everyone in the world would be a paragon of wisdom, but it is not that at all. It is a matter of facing the thing you least want to face
blogs.author: Jordan Peterson
